summary: This bill, H.R. 1426, proposes to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986. It aims to increase the amount of tax credits available for expenses related to household and dependent care services. Specifically, it doubles the credit amounts in Section 21(c). It also increases the employer-provided child care credit, raising the applicable amount in section 45F(b). Both changes are effective for taxable years beginning after the bill's enactment.
